summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of All Remotes Australia e-commerce platform completed successfully. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate) and frontend functionality excellent (95%+ success rate). All waterfall model Phase 5 features tested and operational.

ui_bugs.issue: Occasional timeout issues during manual selection tab interaction

passed_tests: Backend API - 100% success rate (14/14 endpoints working)
Black top bar with warranty/shipping info displays correctly
Multi-level navigation dropdown menus (5 categories with subcategories)
Car Finder rego search functionality (mock API working)
Car Finder manual selection core functionality
Homepage enhanced layout with hero section, categories, featured products
Shop page with working filters (category, brand, search)
All 25 products load correctly with Australian car brands
Product detail page with image zoom functionality
Product specifications and related products display
Quantity controls and add to cart functionality
Wishlist button functionality (requires login)
Admin login with credentials (admin@allremotes.com.au / admin123)
Admin dashboard with all 5 tabs (Overview, Products, Orders, Customers, Settings)
Analytics dashboard with revenue, orders, products, low stock cards
CSV import/export functionality working
Products management table with 25 products
Orders management with 3 test orders
Customer management table
Mobile responsive navigation with hamburger menu
Mobile responsive layout for all pages
Search functionality in header
Category navigation with subcategory dropdowns
Featured products section (8 products displayed)
Product filtering by Toyota brand (2 products found)
Clear filters functionality
Image gallery with thumbnail switching
Stock status display and quantity controls
Footer with branding and copyright

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major features working, minor UI timing issue in Car Finder)
